articles.content: Virat Kohli was not a happy man, sitting on the fence, watching the Indian cricket team play horrible cricket in the 2nd ODI vs West Indies on Saturday (July 29) at Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Bar… [+1869 chars]

articles.title: India did not bat like they were supposed to, says Hardik Pandya after loss in 2nd ODI vs West Indies - India Today
articles.description: Stand-in captain for the Indian team, Hardik Pandya, felt that India failed to bat as planned against West Indies in the 2nd ODI match at Barbados.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: India captain Hardik Pandya blamed the batting unit for India's loss in the 2nd ODI match of the series vs West Indies. India, sent to bat first failed to put up a fight a… [+1720 chars]

articles.title: Footage of Ronaldo's Stunning Volley Ruled Offside Sparks Memories of 2017 UCL Goal Against Bayern - Sports Brief
articles.description: Ronaldo saw his neatly struck volley against Shabab in the Arab Club Champions Cup ruled out for offside, which evoked memories of his strike against Bayern in 2017.
articles.content:
• Cristiano Ronaldo experienced a sense of deja vu in Al-Nassr's Arab Club Champions Cup opener against Al Shabab
